effect.x_y: Raises the Defense and Special Defense of all friendly Pokémon with plus or minus by one stage.
effect.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: Raises the Defense and Special Defense of all friendly Pokémon with plus or minus by one stage.

short_effect.x_y: Raises the Defense and Special Defense of all friendly Pokémon with plus or minus by one stage.
short_effect.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: Raises the Defense and Special Defense of all friendly Pokémon with plus or minus by one stage.

flavor_text.x_y: The user manipulates magnetic fields, which raises the Defense and Sp. Def stats of ally Pokémon with the Plus or Minus Ability.
flavor_text.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: The user manipulates magnetic fields, which raises the Defense and Sp. Def stats of ally Pokémon with the Plus or Minus Ability.
